# Mull - BNB Chain Transaction Explainer

> Mull is a free, open-source web application that explains BNB Chain blockchain transactions in plain, human-readable language.

## What is Mull?

Mull is a transaction explainer for the BNB Chain blockchain. It takes complex blockchain transaction data and converts it into easy-to-understand summaries that anyone can read.

## Key Features

- **Plain Language Explanations**: Converts technical transaction data into simple summaries
- **Visual Flow Diagrams**: Shows token and NFT movements graphically
- **Comprehensive Details**: Gas fees, object changes, balance impacts all in one place
- **Network Support**: Works with both BNB Chain Mainnet and Testnet
- **30+ Transaction Types**: Supports transfers, swaps, staking, NFTs, DeFi, bridges, and more

## Supported Transaction Types

### Basic Operations
- BNB and BEP-20 token transfers
- Token approvals
- Contract interactions

### DeFi
- Token swaps (PancakeSwap, Uniswap, 1inch, etc.)
- Liquidity provision and removal
- Staking and unstaking
- Lending operations (Venus, Alpaca Finance, etc.)
- Liquidations

### NFTs
- NFT transfers
- NFT minting and burning
- Marketplace operations (OpenSea, Element, etc.)

### Advanced
- Smart contract deployments
- Bridge transactions (LayerZero, Wormhole, Celer, etc.)
- Governance voting
- Multisig operations

## How to Use

1. Visit https://bnb.mull.live
2. Paste a BNB Chain transaction hash in the search box
3. Select your network (Mainnet or Testnet)
4. Click "Explain" to see the transaction breakdown

## Technical Details

- Built with Next.js 16 and React 19
- Uses viem and wagmi for blockchain interaction
- Open source under MIT License
- GitHub: https://github.com/leopard627/mull-bnb

## Links

- Website: https://bnb.mull.live
- GitHub: https://github.com/leopard627/mull-bnb
- Twitter: https://x.com/getMullWeb3
